'''The Rainbow Destined to Burn''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 5.1]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* After the Version 5.1 update – 2024/11/19 14:59

===Quick Start Criteria===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 28 or above
* Complete [[Archon Quest]] [[Chapter V]]: Act II "[[Black Stone Under a White Stone]]"

===Summary===
* After the Version 5.1 update, Archon Quests Chapter V: Act III and Act IV will be permanently available. Meet the unlock criteria to unlock said Archon Quests.
* Complete the corresponding Archon Quest within the specified duration to obtain an additional reward of {{Item|Primogem|x=500}}.
